title: Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Shukufuku o! Yorimichi! - Novel Updates
tags: Adventurers   Chuunibyou   Clever Protagonist   Collection of Short Stories   Demons   Fantasy Creatures   Fantasy World   Game Elements   Goddesses   Knights   Lazy Protagonist   Lucky Protagonist   Magic   Male Protagonist   Masochistic Characters   Monsters   Nobles   Parody   Perverted Protagonist   Priestesses   Priests   Quirky Characters   Sword And Magic   Weak Protagonist   Wizards
author: Akatsuki Natsume   暁なつめ
description:
Konosuba: Yorimichi (Lit: Detour) is the short story collection released by Akatsuki Natsume after volume 17 featuring a set of eight brand new short stories. 

Apart from the last story, all of these short stories have previously appeared as Bonus stories for buying the Blu-Ray set.>
